name: Shah
description:
INSTRUCTIONS!

  • Use the LEFT MOUSE CLICK or Q, W and E to select your units.
  • Use the RIGHT MOUSE CLICK to move your units(remember that each unit has its own move pattern!)
  • Don’t let enemies reach the palace on the left of the screen.
  • Kill enemies by moving over them.
  • Enemies stun you if they hit you first!

In the game you need to protect the king to keep the whole kingdom alive. You have unities to stop the invaders with movement inspired in chess: The Rook, the Pawn and the Bishop/Vizier are represented in the game, and you have to move to destroy the units of the enemy

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A few development thoughts:

The theme of this Ludum Dare was Keep it alive. As a starting point, in our conversations at the brainstorm phase, we realized that in chess, we need to keep the king alive. One of us recalled the short TED animation about the history of chess, and used it as some inspiration. The idea was to transform chess into an action game, without any turns, and a multi-management challenge.

Give us some feedback if you feel like it. No matter if you liked the game or not, we'll have lots to learn by hearing you!

If you'd like to keep up with us, feel free to hit us on twitter @ootcstudios.
